auth.enterWorkEmail: Koresha imeyili y'akazi. Niba ikigo cyawe gifite SSO, tuzakugana mu buryo bwikora.
auth.enterEmail: Koresha imeyili yawe kugira ngo winjire mu makandida yawe n'umwirondoro. Tuzakwohereza imeyili y'urufunguzo rw'umutekano.
auth.detectedSSO: Twabonye {provider} kuva mu muryango wawe — urashobora gukomeza cyangwa gukoresha SSO yashyizweho.
auth.noAccess: Nta mwanya ufite? Saba umuyobozi wawe akugenera nk'Umukoresha, Umugenzuzi, cyangwa Umuyobozi.
auth.needHelp: Ukeneye ubufasha bwo kwinjira? Bona ubufasha.
auth.noAccountYet: Nta konti ufite? Tuzayikora ubwinjira kandi tuzahuzanya amakandida yawe mu buryo bwikora.
auth.agreeToTerms: Ukomeje, wemera Amabwiriza n'Ubuyobozi bw'Ubwigenge bwa ProofOfFit n'icyizere cyacu cya EEOC. Turakohereza gusa imeyili z'ibanze z'ikonti n'umutekano.

hero.title: Gushaka abakozi bishingiye ku bimenyetso ku bantu bose.
hero.subtitle: Niba ushakisha akazi kawe gakurikira cyangwa uba ukoze itsinda ryawe, ProofOfFit itanga guhuza ry'umurongo n'ubwigenge, ryashobora gusuzumwa hamwe n'ubwoba bwuzuye.
hero.noCard: Nta karita • Iminota 2 kugeza ku Raporo ya Fit ya mbere

features.title: Imikorere ya AI yakoze
features.subtitle: AI ikumva nk'umukoresha mukuru, si umufasha w'urugamba.
features.description: Tuhuza ubwoba n'ubuyobozi—dukurikira ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ibicuruzwa ukunda, mugihe dushimangira buri cyohereza.

explainableFit.title: Raporo z'Ubwoba z'Ubwoba
explainableFit.description: Mashini yacu y'inkuru ihindura ibisabwa nk'ibimenyetso urashobora gusangira n'abakoresha cyangwa amatsinda y'ubwoba.

adaptiveAutopilot.title: Autopilote yihariye
adaptiveAutopilot.description: Imikorere y'ubuyobozi itegura CV, imikorere, n'amakuru y'ubuhanuzi mugihe ikuguma ku gusaba rumwe.

biasAware.title: Gupima ibimenyetso by'ubwoba
biasAware.description: Turabona ibyago by'ubwoba kandi dushyiraho ibimenyetso byindi kugira ngo urutonde rwawe ruvuge inkuru y'ubwoba n'umurongo.

designGrade.title: Ibikururwa by'ubwoba
designGrade.description: Kuva ku mabwiriza kugeza ku Raporo za Fit, buri musozi wakoze kugira ngo wumve nk'icyo cyemejwe.

whyProofOfFit.title: Kubera iki ProofOfFit
whyProofOfFit.subtitle: Kubera ko gushaka abakozi bihagije ibimenyetso—n'ubwoba bwiza.
whyProofOfFit.description: Guhuza ry'ibanze ry'ibimenyetso, imikorere y'ubwoba y'ubwoba, n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, byose byuzuye mu buhanga bw'ibicuruzwa amatsinda akunda kuba.

explainableMatching.title: Guhuza ry'ubwoba
explainableMatching.description: Reba kuki uhuza, umurongo ku murongo. Nta masuzuma y'ubwoba.

biasReducing.title: Algoritimi yo kugabanya ubwoba
biasReducing.description: Ibimenyetso by'ubwoba n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba bwo gushyigikira ibyemezo by'ubwoba.

immutableAudit.title: Inzira z'ubwoba z'ubwoba
immutableAudit.description: Buri cyemezo gifite URL ishimangirwa—ryiza ku bantu b'ibanze n'ubwoba.

smartAutomation.title: Imikorere y'ubwoba
smartAutomation.description: CV n'amakuru y'ubwoba y'ubwoba y'ubwoba y'ibimenyetso, si ubwoba.

workflow.title: Imikorere
workflow.subtitle: Autopilote y'ubuyobozi ikuguma mu buyobozi.
workflow.description: Buri nzira ikurikira umuvuduko umwe w'ubwoba: kusanganya ibimenyetso, gushyira ku bisabwa, gukora Raporo ya Fit, kandi gusangira hamwe n'ubwoba.

step1.title: Kora ibimenyetso byawe
step1.description: Kuzana CV, ongeraho imikorere, huza ibimenyetso.

step2.title: Hitamo umurimo
step2.description: Turabona JD kandi tuyishyira ku bimenyetso byawe.

step3.title: Bona Raporo yawe ya Fit
step3.description: Urupapuro rw'umurongo urashobora guhuza, wongeyeho CV/ubwoba bw'ubwoba.

step4.title: Kandida hamwe n'ubwoba
step4.description: Menya inkuru yawe mbere y'hamagara umukoresha.

testimonials.title: Ibyemezo
testimonials.subtitle: Bikundwa n'abakandida, byizewe n'amatsinda y'akazi.
testimonials.description: ProofOfFit ikora ubuhanuzi bw'ubwoba ku bakandida kandi itanga abantu b'ibanze amakuru yashobora gusuzumwa.

testimonial1.quote: Nahagaritse gusuzuma. Mu bihe by'ibyumweru bibiri, nari mfite ubuhanuzi bwavugaga Raporo yanjye ya Fit mu buryo bwikora.
testimonial1.author: Amara B., Umusuzuma w'amakuru

testimonial2.quote: Amashyamba y'ubwoba yari yiza cyane. Byahindutse script yanjye y'ubwoba.
testimonial2.author: Luis R., Umuyobozi w'ibicuruzwa

cta.title: Witeguye Guhindura Gushaka Abakozi?
cta.subtitle: Jya mu makigo y'ibihumbi akoresha ProofOfFit kugira ngo yubake amatsinda meza, y'ubwoba hamwe n'ubwoba bwuzuye n'ubwoba.
cta.noCardRequired: Nta karita ihagije • Igerageza ry'ubwoba ry'ibyumweru 14 • Kuraho igihe icyo ari cyo cyose

footer.description: Amakuru, si amashyira y'umukara. Tuhuza ubwoba bw'ubwoba, ubwoba bw'ubwoba, ubwoba bw'ubwoba, n'AI y'ubwoba kugira ngo dukomeze gushaka abakozi byose byiza kandi by'ubwoba.
footer.copyright: © 2024 ProofOfFit, Inc. Yakoze hamwe n'ubwoba mu Midwest, hamwe n'ubwoba n'ubwoba mu mutima.

gift.title: Gutanga ProofOfFit Pro
gift.subtitle: Fasha umuntu kubona akazi ke
gift.description: Tanga impano y'ubwoba bw'akazi bishingiye ku bimenyetso. Fasha umushakisha akazi kubona CV z'ubwoba, amakuru y'ubwoba, n'isuzuma ry'ubwoba ryatuma abona ubuhanuzi byinshi.
gift.securityNotice: Kwishyura kwawe kuri mu mutekano kandi kwijimye. Uwakiriye azakira impano ye mu meyili mu masaha 24 nyuma yo kugura.

success.title: Impano yoherejwe neza! 🎉
success.subtitle: Watanze {months} amezi ya ProofOfFit Pro kuri {recipient}
success.description: Bazakira imeyili hamwe n'urufunguzo rw'impano n'amabwiriza yo gutangira.

fitSimple.title: Gushaka akazi n'isuzuma ry'ubwoba
fitSimple.subtitle: Shakisha umurimo wawe w'ubwoba ukoresheje guhuza ry'ubwoba

jobSearch.title: Gushaka akazi
jobSearch.description: Shakisha akazi bihuza ubuhanga bwawe n'ubuhanga
jobSearch.searchPlaceholder: Shakisha akazi ku mutwe, ikigo, cyangwa aho biherereye...

fitnessAssessment.title: Isuzuma ry'ubwoba
fitnessAssessment.description: Bona isuzuma ry'ubwoba ry'ubwoba w'ubwoba w'ubwoba w'ubwoba

resumeTailoring.title: Guhindura CV
resumeTailoring.description: Bona CV y'ubwoba y'ubwoba y'ubwoba y'ubwoba

step3.title: Kuzana CV yawe
step3.description: Kuzana CV yawe kugira ngo utangire guhuza akazi
step3.dragDrop: Kurura kandi utsindire CV yawe hano, cyangwa kanda kugira ngo usuzume

step4.title: Suzuma umwirondoro wawe
step4.description: Ongeraho amakuru yandi kugira ngo uhindure guhuza kwawe

complete.title: Witeguye!
complete.description: Umwirondoro wawe wuzuye kandi witeguye guhuza akazi

errors.generic: Ikintu cyabaye nabi. Nyamuneka ugerageze nanone.
errors.network: Ikosa ry'ubwoba. Nyamuneka usuzume ubwoba bwawe.
errors.unauthorized: Nta mwanya ufite wo kwinjira muri iyo ntego.
errors.validation: Nyamuneka usuzume ibyo winjije kandi ugerageze nanone.
errors.fileUpload: Kuzana dosiye byanze. Nyamuneka ugerageze nanone.
errors.email: Nyamuneka winjire aderesi ya meyili y'ubwoba.
